org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks

类 ProcessingTimeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks.ProcessingTimeService
  • 直接已知子类:
    SystemProcessingTimeService, TestProcessingTimeService

    public abstract class ProcessingTimeService
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the current processing time and handles all related actions, such as register timers for tasks to be executed in the future.

    The access to the time via getCurrentProcessingTime() is always available, regardless of whether the timer service has been shut down.

    The registration of timers follows a life cycle of three phases:

    1. In the initial state, it accepts timer registrations and triggers when the time is reached.
    2. After calling quiesce(), further calls to registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will not register any further timers, and will return a "dummy" future as a result. This is used for clean shutdown, where currently firing timers are waited for and no future timers can be scheduled, without causing hard exceptions.
    3. After a call to shutdownService(), all calls to registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will result in a hard exception.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
      ProcessingTimeService()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCurrentProcessingTime

        public abstract long getCurrentProcessingTime()
        Returns the current processing time.

      • registerTimer

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> registerTimer(long timestamp,
                                                                      ProcessingTimeCallback target)
        Registers a task to be executed when (processing) time is timestamp.
        参数:
        timestamp - Time when the task is to be executed (in processing time)
        target - The task to be executed
        返回:
        The future that represents the scheduled task. This always returns some future, even if the timer was shut down

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        public abstract java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(ProcessingTimeCallback callback,
                                                                            long initialDelay,
                                                                            long period)
        Registers a task to be executed repeatedly at a fixed rate.
        参数:
        callback - to be executed after the initial delay and then after each period
        initialDelay - initial delay to start executing callback
        period - after the initial delay after which the callback is executed
        返回:
        Scheduled future representing the task to be executed repeatedly

      • isTerminated

        public abstract boolean isTerminated()
        Returns true if the service has been shut down, false otherwise.

      • quiesce

        public abstract void quiesce()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method puts the service into a state where it does not register new timers, but returns for each call to registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) only a "mock" future. Furthermore, the method clears all not yet started timers.

        This method can be used to cleanly shut down the timer service. The using components will not notice that the service is shut down (as for example via exceptions when registering a new timer), but the service will simply not fire any timer any more.

        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • awaitPendingAfterQuiesce

        public abstract void awaitPendingAfterQuiesce()
                                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method can be used after calling quiesce(), and awaits the completion of currently executing timers.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • shutdownService

        public abstract void shutdownService()
        Shuts down and clean up the timer service provider hard and immediately. This does not wait for any timer to complete. Any further call to registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will result in a hard exception.

      • shutdownAndAwaitPending

        public abstract boolean shutdownAndAwaitPending(long time,
                                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
                                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Shuts down and clean up the timer service provider hard and immediately. This does wait for all timers to complete or until the time limit is exceeded. Any call to registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will result in a hard exception after calling this method.
        参数:
        time - time to wait for termination.
        timeUnit - time unit of parameter time.
        返回:
        true if this timer service and all pending timers are terminated and false if the timeout elapsed before this happened.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
